ComicInfo.Series: Clive Barker's Book of the Damned: A Hellraiser Companion
ComicInfo.Summary:
Who was the enigmatic Johnny John? Was he a tortured artist, a prophet, or merely a psychotic killer? No matter what he was, the appearance of the now infamous Revelations remains a mystery.
And here, for the first time, is the complete tome that has, since its creation, spawned a generation of worshipers.
What lies within these covers may shock you and surprise you, and, whether you believe or not --- you're in for one Hell of a read...
ComicInfo.Title: The Revelation of Johnny John
ComicInfo.Penciller: Tristan Schane,Scott Koblish,Dan Lawlis,Bill Koeb,Joe Barruso,Kent Williams,Miran Kim,Tristan Schane,Scott Koblish,Dan Lawlis,Bill Koeb,Joe Barruso,Kent Williams,Miran Kim
